original_text: Now the apostles and the brothers who were throughout Judea heard that the Gentiles also had received the word of God.
korean_text: 유대에 있는 사도들과 형제들이 이방인들도 하나님의 말씀을 받았다 함을 들었더니

sentences.original_text: Now the apostles and the brothers who were throughout Judea heard
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사도들과 온 유대에 있는 형제들이 들었다

sentences.original_text: that the Gentiles also had received the word of God.
